trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_SEQ_00<tab>Matsya cannot help but fear the worst.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Yeruvvet.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Alisaie.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_TODO_02<tab>Search for the villagers of Palaka's Stand.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_TODO_03<tab>Aid the villager woman.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Matsya.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_TODO_05<tab>Defeat the beasts at Purusa.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_000<tab>If Mehvan fled deeper into the jungle, she and her child are in grave danger! Wh-Whatever are we to do!? Gods have mercy!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_Q1_000_001<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_A1_000_002<tab>You must try to stay calm, Matsya.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_A1_000_003<tab>You cannot let fear consume you...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_A1_000_004<tab>Do you want to turn into a beast like the others?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_005<tab>But...how can I at a time like this? They could be dead!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_006<tab>So...if I allow myself to be overcome by this fear, I, too, might become a beast? I am not sure I understand, but I will do my best...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_007<tab>Fear...consume me? What are you talking about?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_008<tab>Then...I, too, could become a beast? I...I understand. I think.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_009<tab>M-Me? A beast? What are you talking about!?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_010<tab>Gods... So that is what causes it? Then I have no choice...I must keep my fear in check.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_011<tab>I've seen to the wounded. How did the two of you fare? Did you find your friends?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_012<tab>...I see. In that case, let us help you find the mother and child.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>Before we leave, we must ensure the village will be safe in our absence.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_014<tab>Alisaie and I will patrol the area and search for more beasts.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>Would you and Matsya speak with Elder Yeruvvet? Pray explain to him the situation, and join us as soon as you are able.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_016<tab>We <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> save Mehvan and her child. We can do that much for Qerasaf...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_020<tab><sniff> It will not be easy... But I will tell the elder about Qerasaf...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_YERUVVET_000_030<tab>I am heartened to see you both safe, but what of the family?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_031<tab>We found Qerasaf, b-but...he...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_YERUVVET_000_032<tab>Say no more. I understand. We have lost another of our dear friends...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_YERUVVET_000_033<tab>Qerasaf may be gone, but there is still hope for Mehvan and their child. Please find them, I beg of you!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_YERUVVET_000_034<tab>And if, in your search, you come across anyone else who escaped the slaughter, pray tell them what has happened.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_YERUVVET_000_035<tab>I will do my best to keep the villagers safe...and their spirits high.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_036<tab>Come, let us rejoin your friends at once!

TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_YERUVVET_000_040<tab>Qerasaf and Mehvan married only three summers ago. The day their daughter was born...I had never seen them so happy. They did not deserve this─none of these people did.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_045<tab>We encountered no beasts during our patrol, thankfully.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_050<tab>Where might Mehvan have run off to? Think, Matsya, think!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_060<tab>I'm pleased to report that the vicinity appears to be beast-free─no doubt thanks to your earlier efforts.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_061<tab>And with that, let us resume our search for your friend and her child. Where should we begin, Matsya?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_062<tab>If we follow Ksiroda south, we will arrive at Purusa, a temple. It is a sacred place where people go to commune with the divinities.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_063<tab>It's possible that Mehvan sought shelter there, and perhaps other villagers as well...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_064<tab>Then it's settled. Matsya, stay close to me, all right?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>You two, take the lead. Keep an eye out for beasts and anyone in need of help.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_066<tab>Very well. We make for Purusa, as quickly as we are able. With me!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_SUFFERER04414_000_070<tab>Th-Thank you... I thought I was done for...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_SUFFERER04414_000_071<tab>Hm? Mehvan? She is a friend of mine, too, but I have not seen her...

TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_SUFFERER04414_000_072<tab>She must still be out there somewhere, trying to avoid the beasts. And with her child, gods... Worry not for me─I can make my way back to the village on my own!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, wait! Purusa lies just up ahead, but something terrible has happened!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_081<tab>The beasts have come, and many have already been killed!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_082<tab>Alphinaud and Alisaie have gone to do what they can, but there are so, so many─more than I could count. You must be ready...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_MATSYA_000_090<tab>I...I am fine. I will be safe hiding here. Please, you must help those people!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_095<tab>Remain calm, and do not wander off! I will tend to the wounded.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>Stay strong! We'll keep you safe─I promise!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_BALLOON_000_110<tab>Graaaghhhaggghhhrrr...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_BALLOON_000_111<tab>No... No... Gragnghhh...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_BALLOON_000_120<tab>Aieeeaaaaaagh!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_BALLOON_000_121<tab>Urk... Urgh...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_POPMESSAGE_000_130<tab>The villager transforms into a beast and lunges towards you!
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_BALLOON_000_131<tab>S-Someone... heeeaaarlggghhhp.
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_BALLOON_000_132<tab>No... Please...naaarrrghhh...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_BALLOON_000_133<tab>He...help...help meaaarrrghhh...
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_140<tab>There you are! How fare the others?
TEXT_AKTKMD106_04414_ALPHINAUD_000_141<tab>...I see. You've seen to all the beasts in sight? In that case, let's have everyone gather in front of the temple.
